description.value:
A set of codes indicating the role of the decedent in a injury involving a transportation vehicle.
**Inter-jurisdictional Exchange (IJE) concept mapping**
|VRDR IG Code | VRDR IG Display Name | IJE Code |IJE Display Name | -------- | -------- | -------- | --------| |236320001|Vehicle driver|DR|Driver/Operator| |257500003|Passenger|PA|Passenger| |257518000|Pedestrian|PE|Pedestrian| |OTH|Other| | | |UNK|unknown| | | |NA|not applicable| | |
